title: Image Mapping
description: Regions of interest obtained from image mapping.

binary_seg_map.description: Results of a computer vision task, in which specific regions of a region are mapped.

cell_seg_data.description: Data produced from the analysis of cellular image.

cell_seg_data_summary.description: Summary of the results of a cell segmentation data experiment.

phenotype_map.description: Image produced from the combination of multiple imaging experiment data images.

score_data.description: Generation of values based on based on experiment data.
